PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FireRatingProperties
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties related to the combustion of materials for purposes of assessing fire hazard.

PropertyDef.Name: FireResistanceRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire rating identifying the entity's fire resistive value (e.g., 1-hour, 2-hour, etc.) so that its resistance to fire can be compared to that of the surrounding structure.

PropertyDef.Name: IsCombustible
PropertyDef.Definition: Combustibility (YES it is combustible or NO it is not combustible).
